metadata.name: Dua for entering the cemetary - I.  Hussain

arabic: اَلَّتِيْ خَرَجَتْ مِنَ الدُّنْيَا وَهِيَ بِكَ مُؤْمِنَةٌ
اَدْخِلْ عَلَيْهِمْ رَوْحًا مِنْكَ وَسَلاَمًا مِنِّي
translation: Oh Allah Lord of these extinct souls whose stay in this world was temporary
that left this world bearing faith in You
Grant them happiness from You and salutations from me
transliteration: al latī kharajat minad dunyā wahiya bika mu-minah
